/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a verdant canopy over the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's vibrant life. The sky overhead is a blanket of gray, suggesting an overcast day.
